description: This file defines a React component for an authentication page, handling sign-in, sign-up, and sign-out flows using various API calls and managing user state.

methods.name: AuthPage
methods.description: React functional component providing UI and logic for user authentication including sign-in, sign-up, and sign-out functionalities.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission for sign-in or sign-up, manages UI states, calls API functions, and updates user state accordingly.

methods.name: handleSignOut
methods.description: Handles user sign-out, updates UI states, and clears user data.
